requirementText.name: OAIS Package type information
requirementText.description: mets/metsHdr/@csip:OAISPACKAGETYPE is an additional CSIP attribute that declares the type of the IP. See also: OAIS Package type, https://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#VocabularyOAISPackageType

testCase.description: mets/metsHdr/@csip:OAISPACKAGETYPE MUST exist. mets/metsHdr/@csip:OAISPACKAGETYPE MUST have a value from the VocabularyOAISPackageType as defined by DILCIS Board.

error.message: mets/metsHdr/@csip:OAISPACKAGETYPE attribute does not exist. MUST be: attribute exists and has a value.

package.name: mets-xml_metsHdr_OAISPACKAGETYPE_attribute_not_exist
package.description: METS.xml file has no mets/metsHdr/@csip:OAISPACKAGETYPE attribute.

rule.description: mets/metsHdr/@csip:OAISPACKAGETYPE MUST have a value from the VocabularyOAISPackageType as defined by DILCIS Board.

error.message: mets/metsHdr/@csip:OAISPACKAGETYPE attribute has incorrect value. MUST be: attribute has a value from the VocabularyOAISPackageType as defined by DILCIS.
